column1: The Pit Room////I just had the feast for 5 for a dinner party I'm having tonight in less than an hour. It's enough food for about 2-3 people. The markets salad is so sad looking with all iceberg lettuce
column2: brown avocado and enough dressing and toppings for one person. I'm too embarrassed to serve any of this and ordering from a neighborhood restaurant this second to make up for what was delivered to me. Was hoping this would be my go to dinner parties but will never make this mistake again.
